Headings

H4 20px MOO Bryant Pro Medium

H5 18px MOO Bryant Pro Medium
H6 15px MOO Bryant Pro Regular
Heading classes:

It is possible to apply the above heading sizes to other elements, using the following CSS classes: .h1, .h2, .h3, .h4, .h5, .h6

Color

There are helper classes available to change the text color of elements. Which can either be .text-body or .text-primary
